spec_data.Name: claws-mail-plugins-newmail
spec_data.Description:
Write a message header summary to a log file (defaults to ~/Mail/NewLog) on
arrival of new mail *after* sorting.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 17 Sep 2017 05:07:12 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Make Claws Mail write a message header summary to a file
